bibl.title: Imperial Largess in the Papyri.
bibl.note: A complement to: Rafael TAUBENSCHLAG, Die kaiserlichen Privilegien im Rechte der Papyri, ZSav 70 (1953) pp. 277-298 = Opera Minora. II (Varsovie, 1959) pp. 45-68. - Reviews the non-legislative evidence.
